alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Oglala Lakota; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Foot Hills; Todd (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Extreme Fire Danger issued October 22 at 3:15AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...EXTREME GRASSLAND FIRE DANGER ACROSS SOUTHWEST SOUTH DAKOTA TODAY... .DISCUSSION...Skies will be partly cloudy today with highs ranging from the 60s across northwest South Dakota to the 80s across far southern South Dakota. Winds will be southeasterly at 10 to 20 mph across northwest South Dakota, south to southwest at 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 35 mph across much of the southwest and south central South Dakota plains. Relative humidities will drop to 20 to 35 percent across northwest South Dakota, 10 to 20 percent elsewhere to the south. ...EXTREME FIRE DANGER... The grassland fire danger index will reach the extreme category this afternoon. Extreme weather conditions and very low moisture content of grasses, and other dry organic material on the ground, indicate that critical burning conditions exist. All fires have the potential to become large and spread quickly becoming erratic with extreme behavioral characteristics. No outdoor burning should take place. The outlook for Sunday afternoon, The grassland fire danger index will reach the moderate category to very high category.
